data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I really want to get a fast red car. My ____ doesn't ____ that ____ much. She ____ about ____ driving ____. She ____ I ____ get ____ in a red ____. But I think it will be a lot of fun to drive a car like that.
data.partBlankContent: I really want to get a fast red car. My m__ doesn't li__ that ve__ much. She wor____ about m_ driving fa__. She sa__ I wi__ get tic____ in a red c__. But I think it will be a lot of fun to drive a car like that.
data.answer: 我真的很想买一辆红色的跑车。我妈妈不太喜欢。她担心我开得太快。她说我会在一辆红色的车里收到罚单。但我认为像那样开车会很有趣。
